description: `PaymentExternalBusinessFactory::createStoreReferenceFacade()()` in `Spryker\Zed\PaymentExternal\Business\PaymentExternalBusinessFactory::createStoreReferenceFacade()` contains 0 new statements which violates rule "A create*() method in factories must contain exactly 1 `new` statement for instantiation."
Bridges: The bridge constructor doc block is missing a parent interface. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
